class.name: GeographicLocationByIP
class.author: Matt Weber and Edward A. Lee

input.name: host
input.description: A host name or IP address. The empty string indicates the current host running this accessor.

output.name: geoCoordinates
output.description: Lattitude and longitude determined from this host's ip address. This is a JSON object with two numeric fields named 'latitude' and 'longitude'.

class.description: This accessor, when fired, reads the geographic location of this host's ip address from freegeoip.net.
